testcase.name: PowerShell Version Requirements.Core Version Validation.Should be running PowerShell 7.0 or higher
PowerShell Version Requirements.Core Version Validation.Should be PowerShell Core (not Windows PowerShell)
PowerShell Version Requirements.Core Version Validation.Should have CLR version compatible with .NET Core/5+
PowerShell Version Requirements.Core Version Validation.Should support the required PowerShell host features
PowerShell Version Requirements.Cross-Platform Variables.Should have cross-platform automatic variables available
PowerShell Version Requirements.Cross-Platform Variables.Should correctly identify exactly one platform
PowerShell Version Requirements.Cross-Platform Variables.Should have IsCoreCLR set to true
PowerShell Version Requirements.Version Detection Functions.Should have version checking utility available
PowerShell Version Requirements.Version Detection Functions.Should load and execute version checking utility
PowerShell Core Cmdlet Availability.Essential Management Cmdlets.Should have all required management cmdlets available
PowerShell Core Cmdlet Availability.Essential Management Cmdlets.Should have utility cmdlets available
PowerShell Core Cmdlet Availability.Essential Management Cmdlets.Should have network cmdlets available
PowerShell Core Cmdlet Availability.Module Management Cmdlets.Should have module management cmdlets available
PowerShell Core Cmdlet Availability.Module Management Cmdlets.Should support advanced module features
PowerShell Feature Compatibility.Language Features.Should support modern PowerShell syntax features
PowerShell Feature Compatibility.Language Features.Should support pipeline chain operators
PowerShell Feature Compatibility.Language Features.Should support null conditional operators
PowerShell Feature Compatibility.Language Features.Should support enhanced error handling
PowerShell Feature Compatibility.Type System Features.Should support .NET Core/.NET 5+ type loading
PowerShell Feature Compatibility.Type System Features.Should support PowerShell class definitions
PowerShell Feature Compatibility.Type System Features.Should support enum definitions
PowerShell Feature Compatibility.Performance and Memory Features.Should handle large datasets efficiently
PowerShell Feature Compatibility.Performance and Memory Features.Should support parallel processing features
AitherZero Specific Version Requirements.Entry Point Version Checking.Should validate PowerShell version in Start-AitherZero.ps1
AitherZero Specific Version Requirements.Entry Point Version Checking.Should validate PowerShell version in Start-DeveloperSetup.ps1
AitherZero Specific Version Requirements.Module Compatibility.Should verify core modules work with current PowerShell version
AitherZero Specific Version Requirements.Module Compatibility.Should test version-specific features in modules
AitherZero Specific Version Requirements.Performance Validation.Should meet performance expectations for version checking
AitherZero Specific Version Requirements.Performance Validation.Should validate module loading performance
Version Compatibility Warnings and Recommendations.Version Recommendations.Should identify if running on recommended PowerShell version
Version Compatibility Warnings and Recommendations.Version Recommendations.Should warn about deprecated PowerShell versions
Version Compatibility Warnings and Recommendations.Feature Availability Assessment.Should assess modern PowerShell feature availability
